email_chain.subject: Inquiry: Vessel for Steel Coils from Rotterdam to Houston
email_chain.body:
Dear Laura,

I hope this message finds you well. We are in need of a vessel to transport 12,500MT of steel coils from Rotterdam to Houston on FOB terms. Could you provide a quote and confirm vessel availability for a laycan of October 10-15?

Best regards,
Michael Carter

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry: Vessel for Steel Coils from Rotterdam to Houston
email_chain.body:
Hi Michael,

Thank you for your inquiry. I can offer the MV OCEAN HORIZON, DWT 45,000, LOA 190m, currently available for your cargo. The initial freight quote is USD 45 per MT. Laycan is 10-15 October. Please let me know if this works for you.

Best regards,
Laura Bennett

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry: Vessel for Steel Coils from Rotterdam to Houston
email_chain.body:
Hi Laura,

Thanks for the quick response. USD 45 per MT seems a bit high given the current market conditions. Could you review the rate? Also, could you confirm the demurrage rate and the loading window?

Best regards,
Michael Carter

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry: Vessel for Steel Coils from Rotterdam to Houston
email_chain.body:
Hi Michael,

Considering the current market, I can adjust the rate to USD 42 per MT. The demurrage rate is USD 10,000 per day, pro rata, and the loading window is 48 hours. Let me know if this works for you.

Best regards,
Laura Bennett

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry: Vessel for Steel Coils from Rotterdam to Houston
email_chain.body:
Hi Laura,

USD 42 per MT sounds reasonable. Can we proceed with the MV OCEAN HORIZON for a laycan of 10-15 October? Please send over the charter party for review.

Best regards,
Michael Carter

email_chain.subject: Fwd: Charter Party for MV OCEAN HORIZON
email_chain.body:
Hi Michael,

Great, I'll proceed with the booking. Attached is the charter party for your review. Let me know if you need any adjustments.

Best regards,
Laura Bennett

email_chain.subject: Re: Fwd: Charter Party for MV OCEAN HORIZON
email_chain.body:
Hi Laura,

The charter party looks good. We'll proceed as discussed. Thanks for your help!

Best regards,
Michael Carter
